channel.title: Is This A Bug or a Feature?
channel.description: So, I have this patch working. Everything is fine. Until I add the object in this second screenshot (timer/pulselength): ..and then get no audio output when the patch does Live. Note the outlet of the added object isn't actually connected to anything. In fact, the same object, with nothing connected at all, causes the same issue, seemingly wherever it's placed. There are no errors being flagged up in the Console. a|x

item.title: Is This A Bug or a Feature?
item.dc:creator: @toneburst alx
item.description:
@toneburst wrote:

Cool, thanks for the tipoff.

a|x

Read full topic

item.title: Is This A Bug or a Feature?
item.dc:creator: @toneburst alx
item.description:
@toneburst wrote:

So, I have this patch working.

Screen Shot 2016-05-08 at 22.27.25.png1481x888 94 KB

Everything is fine. Until I add the object in this second screenshot (timer/pulselength):

Screen Shot 2016-05-08 at 22.32.46.png1481x888 95 KB

..and then get no audio output when the patch does Live.

Note the outlet of the added object isn't actually connected to anything. In fact, the same object, with nothing connected at all, causes the same issue, seemingly wherever it's placed.

There are no errors being flagged up in the Console.

a|x

Read full topic
item.source: Is This A Bug or a Feature?
